name: MenuSubmenuRoot
description: Root component for Menu submenu that manages submenu state.

props.name: actionsRef
props.description:
A ref to imperative actions.
- `unmount`: When specified, the menu will not be unmounted when closed.
   Instead, the `unmount` function must be called to unmount the menu manually.
  Useful when the menu's animation is controlled by an external library.
- `close`: When specified, the menu can be closed imperatively.

props.name: children
props.description:
The content of the popover.
This can be a regular React node or a render function that receives the `payload` of the active trigger.

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description:
Whether the menu is initially open.

To render a controlled menu, use the `open` prop instead.

props.name: defaultTriggerId
props.description:
ID of the trigger that the popover is associated with.
This is useful in conjunction with the `defaultOpen` prop to create an initially open popover.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

props.name: handle
props.description:
A handle to associate the menu with a trigger.
If specified, allows external triggers to control the menu's open state.

props.name: highlightItemOnHover
props.description:
Whether moving the pointer over items should highlight them.
Disabling this prop allows CSS `:hover` to be differentiated from the `:focus` (`data-highlighted`) state.

props.name: loopFocus
props.description:
Whether to loop keyboard focus back to the first item
when the end of the list is reached while using the arrow keys.

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Event handler called when the menu is opened or closed.

props.name: onOpenChangeComplete
props.description: Event handler called after any animations complete when the menu is closed.

props.name: open
props.description: Whether the menu is currently open.

props.name: orientation
props.description:
The visual orientation of the menu.
Controls whether roving focus uses up/down or left/right arrow keys.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the componentâ€™s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: triggerId
props.description:
ID of the trigger that the popover is associated with.
This is useful in conjunction with the `open` prop to create a controlled popover.
There's no need to specify this prop when the popover is uncontrolled (i.e. when the `open` prop is not set).

props.name: closeParentOnEsc
props.description: Whether to close the parent menu when pressing Escape in submenu.
